1375: Karis was born in Cromme straet in 1375.
1381: Lost father at the age of 6.
1388: Lost mother at the age of 13.
1394: Got married to Thedwi at age 20 in 1394.
Karis moved to Stoof straet.B.1 after marriage.
1395: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Thedwi, at age 20.
1397: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Moerseil, at age 22.
1398: Lost his wife Thedwi while she was giving birth to Clementia in 1398.
Became caretaker of Thedwi, Moerseil, Clementia at age 24.
Got married a second time to Nimme at age 24 in 1398.
Had Nimme move in at Stoof straet.B.1 after marriage.
1399: Had a son with Nimme, Wilbord, at age 24.
